name: places/ChIJX9AW9QP2wokRmV-eJscpI6g
formattedAddress: 102 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 102 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
Marcy is a wonderful warm and delightful tax preparer. She's been doing my taxes over 17 years. She dose an awesome job. When ever I have an issue with my taxes, she's always been there. She's very quick and professional and I love it. As you can see I'm still with her after all these years. I referred many of my people's because she's just that good. I respect her professionalism and with that being said...
Thank you Marcy for being great at what you do.

originalText.text: Marcie is an excellent tax expert who is knowledgeable about the tax laws.  She keeps in contact and answers any questions you may have. Great customer service!  I highly recommend the site at 102 East 116th Street, and tell Marcie that I sent you!

text.text: Marcie is an excellent tax expert who is knowledgeable about the tax laws.  She keeps in contact and answers any questions you may have. Great customer service!  I highly recommend the site at 102 East 116th Street, and tell Marcie that I sent you!

originalText.text: Marcie was the best tax preparer I ever been to since I started filing my own taxes. Anything I didn’t understand she sat and took the time to explain every last details. Even when I was making her repeat herself because I still didn’t understand, Marcie took the extra step to make calls to make sure I was secure with everything that was owed to me. She made sure to contact Jackson Hewitt help desk to make sure she prepared my taxes correctly and properly and also explained what they were saying to my best understanding. If you are looking for a friendly very professional tax preparer that’s going to look out for you instead of themselves Marcie is the lady to go to. I love you and the office Marcie!

originalText.text: I've been coming to Marcy for about 10 to 15 years, she is so welcoming and professional. Really knows what she is doing and how to work with all different types of people. Does not mess around when working with people. She is amazing and highly would recommend anyone to come see her to do their taxes.

originalText.text:
Marcie Lillo,

You are such an excellent tax preparer. You always give your clients the best treatment. I definitely will be back for the next tax season. I will refer my friends to you. Thank you.

Best,

Sharlene
